sentences.en: " Who was that fiddling here? " asked the gruff voiced soldier.
sentences.cn: 且听到有个哑嗓子问: “ 是什么人在此唱歌作乐?

sentences.en: All you're going to see is a lot of fiddling around.
sentences.cn: 你今天要看到的只是大量的胡摆乱弄.

sentences.en: Always fiddling with the piano or sticking their heads in a book.
sentences.cn: 整天要么弹钢琴,要么钻书本.

sentences.en: At once the fiddling stopped. All became quiet.
sentences.cn: 里面琴声叹然而止,沉静了.

sentences.en: Expense allowances are apt to mean fiddling.
sentences.cn: 开销津贴容易造成弄虚作假.

sentences.en: fiddling little jobs around the house
He was fiddling with a piece of string.
sentences.cn: 他在无聊地玩弄一条绳子.

sentences.en: He was fiddling with his keys while he talked to me.
sentences.cn: 和我谈话时他不停地摆弄钥匙。

sentences.en: I was fiddling in the fields.
Richard was fiddling with the Ford's radio.
sentences.cn: 理查德在摆弄这辆福特车里的收音机.

sentences.en: She was fiddling self-consciously with her wedding ring.
sentences.cn: 她局促不安地摸着婚戒。

sentences.en: Stop fiddling ( about ) and do some work.

sentences.cn: 不要再在开支账户上动手脚了。

words.tran_cn: 拉提琴的人；小提琴手；骗子；游荡者
无用的；无足轻重的；微不足道的（等于fiddly）

phrases.tran_cn: 摆弄；乱动；玩弄；弄虚作假
二流的人；交响乐队中第二小提琴部

trans.tran_cn: 无足轻重地，微不足道地，无用的
伪造( fiddle的现在分词 )，篡改，骗取，修理或稍作改动
